name: Colourfull Souls
description:
Colourful souls is a 2d platformer adventure game where you play a fox trying to get every berry, colour the platforms to bring colour back to the world and reach the end goal

This game was made for global game jam 2022 jan 28th-jan30th 

the team!
Hitokirichibi and nefily: artists
Akira: Game programmer and tech expert 
Noah rapetti: Designer
